analysis.description:
RLC.startDate (/unique_chucks/32/0xb0ce867bf4cc52d13f79155dcd398de62bc5f111.sol#105-106) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0xb0ce867bf4cc52d13f79155dcd398de62bc5f111.sol#214-226)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/32/0xb0ce867bf4cc52d13f79155dcd398de62bc5f111.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/32/0xb0ce867bf4cc52d13f79155dcd398de62bc5f111.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/32/0xb0ce867bf4cc52d13f79155dcd398de62bc5f111.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
